item.title: How I ended up with AI-generated Music Reviews on TikTok
item.description: This is a fun story, with a series of technologies and topics that I couldn’t believe they were capable of living together… EDM, TikTok, Text-To-Speech, AI, Playwright… Many times, when going down this over-engineered rabbit hole, I thought, “OK, I have to write about this thing.” And also, “What am I doing here with my time?” ðŸ“š Some context So, here are a few key things to be aware of:
